front.title: •Rayc Ryjerd
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots (or 4 if trained by Rycar Ryjerd). Any starfighter Rayc pilots is immune to Tallon Roll and is not lost if an asteroid sector is drawn for asteroid destiny.
front.lore: An 'honest' smuggler. Working for Jabba to pay off debts for his ship. Rycar's son. Even more of an idiot.

pulledBy: Soth Petikkin (when at a Jabba's Palace site you control)
